argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ordom | |- Ord _om |
| 2 |  | #P_ordeleqon | |- ( Ord _om <-> ( _om e. On \/ _om = On ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ordirr | |- ( Ord _om -> -. _om e. _om ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- -. _om e. _om |
| 5 |  | #P_elom | |- ( _om e. _om <-> ( _om e. On /\ A. x ( Lim x -> _om e. x ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_baib | |- ( _om e. On -> ( _om e. _om <-> A. x ( Lim x -> _om e. x ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_mtbii | |- ( _om e. On -> -. A. x ( Lim x -> _om e. x ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_limomss | |- ( Lim x -> _om C_ x ) |
| 9 |  | #P_limord | |- ( Lim x -> Ord x ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ordsseleq | |- ( ( Ord _om /\ Ord x ) -> ( _om C_ x <-> ( _om e. x \/ _om = x ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 9, 10 | #P_sylancr | |- ( Lim x -> ( _om C_ x <-> ( _om e. x \/ _om = x ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_mpbid | |- ( Lim x -> ( _om e. x \/ _om = x ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ord | |- ( Lim x -> ( -. _om e. x -> _om = x ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_limeq | |- ( _om = x -> ( Lim _om <-> Lim x ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_biimprcd | |- ( Lim x -> ( _om = x -> Lim _om ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_syld | |- ( Lim x -> ( -. _om e. x -> Lim _om ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_con1d | |- ( Lim x -> ( -. Lim _om -> _om e. x ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_com12 | |- ( -. Lim _om -> ( Lim x -> _om e. x ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_alrimiv | |- ( -. Lim _om -> A. x ( Lim x -> _om e. x ) ) |
| 20 | 7, 19 | #P_nsyl2 | |- ( _om e. On -> Lim _om ) |
| 21 |  | #P_limon | |- Lim On |
| 22 |  | #P_limeq | |- ( _om = On -> ( Lim _om <-> Lim On ) ) |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( _om = On -> Lim _om ) |
| 24 | 20, 23 | #P_jaoi | |- ( ( _om e. On \/ _om = On ) -> Lim _om ) |
| 25 | 2, 24 | #P_sylbi | |- ( Ord _om -> Lim _om ) |
| 26 | 1, 25 | #P_ax-mp | |- Lim _om |
